Fleet Card Tools & Driver Training
You have ordered your cards and any day your cards and driver ID numbers will arrive. They will arrive in 2 separate envelopes. For security purposes these packages are not branded and will say that they are from Fleet Services. Please be on the lookout for these envelopes!
Getting started with the Marathon Universal Card is quick and easy. Below are some tools to help you begin saving time and money.
